name: OUR ATLANTIS (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ the game
description:
OUR ATLANTIS (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ THE GAME 

Hello my friends! Here is a game for you! ENJOY!!! :D 

If you finish the game, you will find a secret song to listen to!  

One secret: the game tells you you need 23 loops, but you actually only need 16 ;) 

HOW TO WIN:

Collect all the loop creatures,  kill the enemies (one snake on a lake, snake in the maze and the end pig on the top floor) 

a : Left

 w : forward

s : back

d : Right

 spacebar :  jump

mouse : hit enemy with the pomeranian axe, turn the mouse or using trackpad to look around :) 

Enjoy the game made by dj.flugvél og geimskip and Þórður Hermannsson
